content: k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole kfb k to 2 sts before end of sole kfb k1 => 4 sts increased 28 sts round 2 instep kfb k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole kfb k to 2 sts before end of sole kfb k1 => 32 sts round 3 instep kfb k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole kfb k to 2 sts before end of sole kfb k1 => 36 sts round 4 instep k all sts sole k all sts => even round round 5 instep kfb k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole kfb k to 2 sts before end of sole kfb k1 => 40 sts round 6 instep kfb k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole kfb k to 2 sts before end of sole kfb k1 => 44 sts round 7 instep k all sts sole k all sts => even round round 8-15 alternate increasing and even rounds in the increasing row always kfb the first and penultimate stitch of the instep and the sole thus increasing by 4 sts per increasing round => 60 sts smaller size only round 16 instep k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole k all sts => 61 sts 31 on instep needle s 30 on sole needle s larger size only round 16-19 continue to alternate increasing and even rounds = > 68 sts round 20 instep k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole k to 2 sts before end of sole kfb k1 => 70 sts 35 sts each on instep and sole continue for both sizes knit 2 rounds without increasing further foot instep always work row 1-20 of instep flower pattern sole knit all stitches work in this way until foot measures approx 3 75 4 inches less then desired length start gusset increases after having worked the sole sts of an odd numbered flower round ©caoua coffee 2015 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved longing for spring v 2 page 2/6 longing for spring socks - by caoua coffee instep flower pattern written instructions row 1 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k6 8 twice k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 row 2 knit all instep sts row 3 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk p5 7 twice k2tog yo k3 yo ssk row 4 knit all instep sts row 5 same as row 1 row 6 knit all instep sts row 7 same as row 3 row 8 knit all instep sts row 9 k2 yo sl2kpsso yo k7 9 twice k2 yo sl2kpsso yo k2 row 10 knit all instep sts row 11 k7 8 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k0 1 twice k7 row 12 knit all instep sts row 13 p1 0 p5 7 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk twice p6 7 row 14
